FROM node:20-alpine AS builder
WORKDIR /app

COPY package.json package-lock.json ./
COPY apps/frontend-public/package.json apps/frontend-public/package.json
RUN npm ci

COPY . .
RUN npm run build --workspace apps/frontend-public

FROM node:20-alpine AS runner
WORKDIR /app

ENV NODE_ENV=production
ENV PORT=3000

COPY --from=builder /app/apps/frontend-public/.next ./.next
COPY --from=builder /app/apps/frontend-public/public ./public
COPY --from=builder /app/node_modules ./node_modules
COPY apps/frontend-public/package.json ./
COPY apps/frontend-public/.env.production .env

EXPOSE 3000

CMD ["node", "node_modules/next/dist/bin/next", "start", "-p", "3000"]
